Hyperliquid just shipped Unified Account mode.

What does this mean for you?  
Unified Account simply means that spot + perps share one collateral pool. Your entire balance automatically protects against liquidation.

More importantly:
Unified Account will help unlock
â€¢ Portfolio margin
â€¢ Cross-DEX margin (HIP-3)
â€¢ Capital-efficient trading

This means better capital efficiency, stickier traders/whales & market makers.
